content.question: In discussing an expectation in the nineteenth paragraph, the author uses the phrases “better than the best” and “superhuman strength” primarily to convey

choices.label: indignation at prejudices underlying claims that the expectation cannot be met
lighthearted mockery of those who set the expectation
belief that the expectation reflects unrealistic demands
suspicion that the challenges posed by the expectation have been exaggerated

content.answer: belief that the expectation reflects unrealistic demands

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
